name: Chicken Adobo
description: Chicken Adobo is a popular Filipino dish that is easy to make and full of flavor. Chicken is simmered in a tangy, vinegary sauce that is seasoned with soy sauce, garlic, and bay leaves. Serve it over steamed rice for a delicious meal that the whole family will love.
instructions: In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat.
Add garlic and onion, and cook until softened.
Add chicken and cook until browned on all sides.
Add soy sauce, vinegar, water, bay leaves, and peppercorns.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.
